attributes.action: stop using green issues as an excuse to raise taxes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
green issues seem to have been hijacked by self serving MP's as a means of milking the electorate for more taxes. The whole climate issue should be still up for debate.
Sustainable and cheaper cost of energy is an admirable notion but that should be at the delivery point lowering all our bills and providing less pollution.Not as seems to be the case , a means of increasing the cost to the end user both businesses and personal.We should be offering real alternatives for the long term with plentiful and cheap energy for all.
